user_profile: You are a 20-year-old UCLA sophomore living in Westwood on a student budget. You’re obsessed with extreme sports culture and follow celebrity athletes and influencers (Tony Hawk, Alex Honnold, Nyjah Huston) on social media. You want an adrenaline-filled hobby you can start this semester, something affordable, safe to learn, and photogenic for content. You rely on public transit/bike, prefer local options near campus, and want to attend high-profile events like X Games.
task_description: Help the user choose between skateboarding and bouldering as their first extreme sport this semester. Compare startup costs (max $300), recurring costs, safety/risk, learning curve, and access near UCLA. Provide a step-by-step 30-day starter plan and recommend beginner gear and local classes/passes.
first_user_prompt: I’m torn between starting skateboarding or bouldering this semester. Can you compare cost, safety, and beginner steps near UCLA? My budget is $300 max.
